column5: 2 solid runs of 60-70 yards, a couple short ones and 5 or so minutes later, he was netted.    Same hot lure... A solid 20+ lbs of fun!
good job!  i also caught my second of the year yesterday.
congrats on your 2nd of the year

They sure are fun hooking them aren't they?  The adrenaline rush keeps you going for hours....LOL.  Congrats on your second fish!  Hopefully they'll be around for at least a few more weeks....this salmon fishing thing is fun....haha.
Nice fish !!!!!!   welcome to the world of salmon fishing....cheers
good looking fish, keep it up.
Thanks, but I have been salmon fishing since I could walk.  I was born in BC...
